original_text: Men will come to make Jerusalem free, and they will rule over Edom. And that country will belong to the Lord. 1: God says that he will give to Judah's people the land that belonged to their enemies. God does not forget his people. He does not forget what their enemies did. And he will kill all their enemies. God says that he will save his people and he will make them strong again. Men will come to make Jerusalem free, and they will rule over Edom. And that country will belong to the Lord. 1: God says that he will give to Judah's people the land that belonged to their enemies. God does not forget his people. He does not forget what their enemies did. And he will kill all their enemies. God says that he will save his people and he will make them strong again. Men will come to make Jerusalem free,
korean_text: 구원 받은 자들이 시온 산에 올라와서 에서의 산을 심판하리니 나라가 여호와께 속하리라

sentences.original_text: Men will come to make Jerusalem free
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 예루살렘을 해방시키기 위해 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will rule over Edom
And that country will belong to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 나라는 주님께 속할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God says that he will give to Judah's people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 유다 백성에게 주실 것이라고 말씀하십니다

sentences.original_text: the land that belonged to their enemies
God does not forget his people
He does not forget what their enemies did
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들의 원수들이 한 일을 잊지 않으십니다

sentences.original_text: And he will kill all their enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들의 모든 원수를 죽일 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God says that he will save his people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그의 백성을 구원하실 것이라고 말씀하십니다

sentences.original_text: and he will make them strong again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 다시 강하게 만드실 것입니다
